overview: Fourteen great classic rock anthems brought together in one stunning volume. Worldwide hits by renowned artists such as Deep Purple, Uriah Heep, Asia and Thin Lizzy. These are the anthems which inspired a generation, from the driving blues-rock of Wishbone Ash to the gentle strains of Barclay James Harvest. Every one a classic.  1.  Wishbone Ash - Blowin' Free  2.  Argent - Hold Your Head Up  3.  The Sensational Alex Harvey Band - Delilah  4.  Uriah Heep - Return To Fantasy  5.  Asia - Heat of the Moment  6.  Focus - Sylvia  7.  Emerson, Lake & Palmer - The Barbarian  8.  Family - Strange Band  9.  Curved Air - Melinda More or Less  10. Slade - Get Down And Get With It  11. Deep Purple - Child In Time  12. Free - Songs of Yesterday  13. Thin Lizzy - The Sun Goes Down  14. Barclay James Harvest - Mockingbird
title: Classic Rock: The Anthology
